title: UPDATE: Hunt on for suspects responsible for beating a cop to death
content: Sri Lanka Police on Friday (18) revealed details surrounding the murder of a police constable in Tangalle on Thursday (17) night. Sri Lanka Police said two people were seriously injured following an assault by a group on Thursday (17) night, after a heated argument in Vithrandeniya, Tangalle.The police constableâ€™s brother was transferred to the Karapitiya Teaching Hospital for treatment and is currently unconscious at the Intensive Care Unit. The hotel owners, the woman in question, and the other suspects had fled the area and police investigations are underway to arrest them.
